resources.string: Clash of clans facts and tips(Widget)
Hello world!
Settings
COC facts widget
Add widget
All the hidden teslas reveal themselves automatically after 50% damage
The mortar fires shells every 5 seconds
It is best to keep air defences in a traingle or square formation
The upgrade costs of dark elixir troops increases by 10k per level
Attacking lower town halls results in a loot penalty
Removing the gem box gets you 25 gems
The gem box DOES NOT store your gems, you can remove it without any worries
Deploying all your barbarians/archers/goblins at one single spot can be a bad idea, the mortar can take them out in no time
Keep the mortars in a way that they overlap each other
The cannon\'s maximum damage/second is 98
Cannon\'s can be used to defend mortars and wizard towers by keeping them within range
The cannon can be ideally used to take out wall breakers
Upgrade archer towers before upgrading cannons
The archer tower\'s maximum damage/second is 98
The archer tower\'s maximum damage/shot is 49
The cannon\'s maximum damage/shot is 78.4
The cannon shoots a shell every 0.8 seconds
The archer tower shoots an arrow every 0.5 seconds
Keep the air defences behind a layer of other defences
The air defence\'s maximum damage/second is 320
A great way to take out air defences is via Minion\'s. Make sure there is no Wizard tower near by though
Putting your Wizard towers near storages is a great way of protecting them against hoards of goblins,archers or barbarians
Wizard Towers and Mortars are quite complementary, as they can each cover the others weaknesses
To destroy a Wizard Tower, use Giants to distract and take it out using Minion\'s archers or other ranged troops
